readable.title: 2420730259_86e7f8a815
readable.content: A man holding and kissing a crying little boy on the cheek . a man in a green shirt is kissing a crying toddler whilst watching runners in a road race . A man kissing a baby at a marathon . A man wearing a green shirt is trying to comfort his crying child by holding the child and giving him a kiss on the cheek . Man kisses crying baby at a marathon .
